TableSettings.uniqueName: IdeConnections%23OFPI-PROD-LDAPSELECT --frg.REQUEST_GROUP_NAME, FRV.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME, fu.user_name, fu.email_address, frv.application_id FROM apps.fnd_user fu, apps.FND_USER_RESP_GROUPS frg, apps.fnd_responsibility_vl FRV WHERE 1=1 and fu.user_id = frg.user_id AND frv.RESPONSIBILITY_ID= frg.RESPONSIBILITY_ID and frv.application_id = frg.RESPONSIBILITY_APPLICATION_ID --and frv.application_id = 140 --and frg.RESPONSIBILITY_APPLICATION_ID = 140 --and fcp.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' --AND fcp.USER_CONCURRENT_PROGRAM_NAME LIKE '%KGP%' --AND upper(frv.RESPONSIBILITY_NAME) LIKE 'FIXED%ASSET%MANAGER%' and nvl(frv.end_date, sysdate + 1) > sysdate and fu.user_id in (3298, 71890, 33812) and nvl(fu.end_date, sysdate + 1) > sysdate ORDER BY 2, 1
